price: with the angels on all its sides, and on that Day, eight [mighty angels] will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
